ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 17 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <4> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<5> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <6> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> 67mm UV Filter + <11> 58mm UV Filter + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> LCD Screen Protectors + <16> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <17> 67-58mm Step-Down Adapter Ring
